howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Get started in
howItWorks.step1Desc: Add D23 AI to your WhatsApp contacts
howItWorks.step2Desc: Ask anything in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu or any language
howItWorks.step3Desc: AI responds in your language in under 2 seconds

testimonials.label: Testimonials
testimonials.title: Loved by users across
testimonials.t1Quote: D23 AI understands my Hindi perfectly. It's like talking to a friend who knows everything!
testimonials.t2Quote: தமிழில் AI பயன்படுத்துவது மிகவும் எளிது. I use it daily for translations and recipes.
testimonials.t3Quote: My grandmother uses it to fact-check WhatsApp forwards. The Gujarati support is amazing!
testimonials.t4Quote: Best multilingual AI assistant. The sticker maker is my kids' favorite feature!
testimonials.t5Quote: মাতৃভাষায় AI ব্যবহার করতে পেরে খুবই ভালো লাগছে। Voice feature is incredible!
testimonials.t6Quote: I switched from ChatGPT because D23 understands Marathi context and culture perfectly.

security.label: Security
security.title: Your privacy is
security.encryptionDesc: All your conversations are secured with industry-standard encryption protocols.
security.noDataSharingDesc: We never sell or share your personal data with third parties. Your data stays yours.
security.whatsappSecurityDesc: Built on WhatsApp's trusted platform with additional security layers for AI interactions.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Got
faq.a1: An intelligent WhatsApp AI assistant supporting 11+ languages for instant answers.
faq.a2: Hindi, Marathi, Bengali, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam, Gujarati, Punjabi, Oriya and more.
faq.a3: Yes! You can start chatting without paying anything.
faq.a4: Forward any message for verification. D23 AI searches reliable sources to detect misinformation.
